name: Nutrition Blocks
description:
Nutrition Blocks is a Serious Game inspired by "Breakout" developed to teach players about nutrition.
Credits Background Music - https://opengameart.org/content/menace

Controls
Arrow Key Left - Move Left.
Arrow Key Right - Move Right.
Space - Launch Ball.
Q/W/E/A/S/D - Switch Ball colour.
Esc to Exit.

Portfolio
Itch
